title: Tansener Tanpura
overview: Tansener Tanpura is a Bengali web series streaming on Bengali OTT platform hoichoi from 26th June 2020. The series starring Vikram Chatterjee, Rupsha Chatterjee, Jayati Bhatia, Rajat Ganguly in the lead roles. This thriller web series is about the clues to a treasure, hidden in melodies! Is the art in music the only solution to the mystery?
